entry.summary: RT pbillingsby I just got the 2nd most downloaded model on HuggingFace (all-MiniLM-L6-v2) deployed and running on @Lilypad_Tech in less than an hour. The testing and guides we're currently focused on will make it even easier for other module creators to build and deploy their own modules! 🚀

entry.title: RT Sam aka ScaryBarbie 👽: i started dabbling in crypto in 2021 when i lost my job as a server. -started trading -decided i needed to do something w...
entry.summary: RT Sam aka ScaryBarbie 👽 i started dabbling in crypto in 2021 when i lost my job as a server. -started trading -decided i needed to do something with my time during quarantine & dove into learning how to code -built a following of 30k on instagram by sharing my learning exp journey daily -maintained and grew a community ultimately learning more than just code -how to market myself -work w/ brands/collaborations -design, create content, edit videos -UX/UI design -writing/comms -how to learn quickly & effectively all these skills were self-taught through learning and failing (repeat x100) i then made the leap over to twitter & got involved in web3 communities that accelerated my journey by providing opportunities for me to travel & attend hackathons/workshops (big thanks to @womenbuildweb3 @developer_dao & @camiinthisthang) i wouldn't be where i am if it weren't for being brave enough to take risks even in painful scary times & searching for communities that paved paths for me i didn't even know where possible. i'm forever grateful to be in this industry surrounded by brilliant people creating & building everyday 🫡

entry.title: RT dhai.eth: account abstraction as an idea is about programmatically defining the validity conditions of transactions. almost like a middleware for y...
entry.summary: RT dhai.eth account abstraction as an idea is about programmatically defining the validity conditions of transactions. almost like a middleware for your funds - a middleware that should eval to true or false. smart contract accounts are an extremely inefficient implementation of this idea. study predicates anon:
